title: How to integrate web application with Kriscloud?
author: Damien
description: I have a NodeJS/Sprint boot project with front-end and back-end repos setup on CodeCommit. How do I onboard to Standard pipeline for quality checks and artifact generation?

title: Anyone here playing Mobile Legends? How to use Esmeralda?
author: Reymark Diaz
description: Hi my Fellow ML Colleagues/Players, I became curious with Esmeralda because of her new Skin released last week. I am looking for guides online but can’t seem to grasp. Anyone can help me through an actual game? I can add you – here’s my ML ID 1234553
